sections.aboutText: Telecommunications Engineer with 8+ years of experience in Business Intelligence and Data Engineering. Specialized in data visualization, ETL processes, and analytical solutions across large-scale corporate projects (HP, Puig, Seat, Cosentino, Mutua Universal). Currently expanding skills in Python and backend development, leveraging strong foundation in SQL, data architecture, and problem-solving.

projects.intro: Personal projects developed in my free time to explore new technologies and expand my development skills.
